      • getLogin

        Operator getLogin(Connection con,
                LoginObject loginObject)
                  throws SQLException
        If the operator, specified here in the LoginObject by the attribute login, is not logged in
        this method returns an Operator with a newly created Session after removing all locks (like on Question(s)).
        It also checks for the PW duration. The PW-Status is available in the returned operator status too.

        If the login data (specified in the LoginObject) is not valid it will return a dummy operator with an attribute called accessDeniedTime.
        All login failures will be logged.

        The loginObject needs the following attributes:
        • login
        • encryptedData
        • initializationVector
        • secretKey
        • uuid

        A LoginObject can be received by the getSecretKeyMethod(Connection con)
        Parameters:
        con - the Database-connection
        loginObject -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getSecretKey

        Nonce getSecretKey(Connection con)
                   throws SQLException
        This Method is very important for the login-process.
        LoginObject, the returned Object, is used to store the key to encrypt the password.
        This is usually done by the Method setPassword(String pw). The LoginObject returned by this method MUST be used to call getLogin(Connection con, LoginObject loginObjec) because its unique.
        Parameters:
        con - the Database-connection
        Returns:
        a new incomplete loginObject to encrypt the password on client-side
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • checkLogin

        LoginPermission checkLogin(Connection con,
                         LoginObject loginObject)
                           throws SQLException
        Returns a LoginPermission object to check if an Operator has permission to log in. An Operator has no permission if: - the authentication failed - the operator is not active - the the password is expired
        Parameters:
        con - the Database-connection
        loginObject -
        Returns:
        the LoginPermission object with the denied-time
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • cleanSecretKeyTable

        void cleanSecretKeyTable(Connection con,
                       long time)
                         throws SQLException
        This method cleans the database-table where the secret keys are stored temporary. Deletes all rows of that table that are earlier created than the given time.
        Parameters:
        time - a timestamp
        Throws:
        SQLException
